entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:29 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:29 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023
